title: 가정법 과거완료 재활용
description: Level 6에서 다룬 가정법 과거완료를 더 자연스럽게 사용합니다.
examples: If we had invested in that technology earlier, we would have dominated the market by now.
Had she known about the opportunity, she would have applied for the position immediately.
If they had listened to our advice, they wouldn't have encountered these problems.
learning_points: 가정법 과거완료의 자연스러운 활용과 다양한 표현 방식

sentences.kr: 만약 우리가 그 기술에 더 일찍 투자했다면, 지금쯤 시장을 지배하고 있었을 것이다.
sentences.en: If we had invested in that technology earlier, we would have dominated the market by now.

sentences.kr: 만약 그녀가 그 기회에 대해 알았다면, 즉시 그 자리에 지원했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had she known about the opportunity, she would have applied for the position immediately.

sentences.kr: 만약 그들이 우리의 조언을 들었다면, 이런 문제들을 겪지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If they had listened to our advice, they wouldn't have encountered these problems.

sentences.kr: 만약 경영진이 직원들의 피드백을 고려했다면, 회사 문화가 훨씬 더 좋았을 것이다.
sentences.en: If management had considered employee feedback, the company culture would have been much better.

sentences.kr: 만약 정부가 더 엄격한 규제를 시행했다면, 환경 오염이 이렇게 심각하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had the government implemented stricter regulations, environmental pollution wouldn't have become this severe.

sentences.kr: 만약 팀이 더 체계적으로 계획했다면, 프로젝트가 예정보다 일찍 완료되었을 것이다.
sentences.en: If the team had planned more systematically, the project would have been completed ahead of schedule.

sentences.kr: 만약 그가 더 일찍 의사의 조언을 구했다면, 건강 문제가 이렇게 악화되지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had he sought medical advice sooner, his health problems wouldn't have deteriorated this much.

sentences.kr: 만약 우리가 시장 조사를 더 철저히 했다면, 소비자들의 요구를 더 잘 이해했을 것이다.
sentences.en: If we had conducted more thorough market research, we would have understood consumer needs better.
